text:
Sentieo | Full Time | SF | On Site Position: Marketing - Demand Generation/ Growth Manager

We are looking for an analytical and data driven marketer focused on digital demand generation. Ideal candidate would have experience running digital channels at a successful and modern SaaS organization.

Full job description: https://jobs.lever.co/sentieo/1307aa55-971d-42c4-9d92-529abc...

Email your interest to amy@sentieo.com
